name: cody-toolkit-core
description: Connect to your Dynamics CRM 2016 On-Premise Instances directly from VS Code. Required for other Cody Toolkit extensions.

cody.toolkit.core.backendServerLocation.markdownDescription: Path to the backend server executable. Leave empty if you chose the default location (`%UserProfile%/AppData/Local/CodyToolkitBackend`) during the backend setup.

cody.toolkit.core.backendServerPort.markdownDescription: Port used for launching the backend server. Make sure to reserve that port using `netsh`. Changing the port requires a restart of VS Code to take effect.

cody.toolkit.core.disableSSLCertificateC.markdownDescription: Select this option if you want to disable the SSL Certificate check for CRM connections. This is not recommended and should only be used if no other option is available.
